sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"选择"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: choice, alternative, preference, option, selection, election
means: choice ： 侧重指自由选择的权利或特权。
alternative ： 指在相互排斥的两者之间作严格的选择，也可指在两者以上中进行选择。
preference ： 侧重因偏见、爱好或判断等而进行选择。
option ： 着重特别给予的选择权利或权力，所选物常常相互排斥。
selection ： 指作广泛的选择，着重选择者的识别力或鉴赏力。
election ： 强调目的和达到目的判断能力。

word_mean: 为达到指定的经济发展目标，可供决策者比较选择的、具有同等研究深度的各种工程方案。

sentence.Network_en: New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers.
sentence.Network_cn: 关节炎的新疗法可能是止痛药之外的另一种选择。

sentence.Network_en: It seems clear that he has no reasonable alternative.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有其他合适的选择，这一点似乎很清楚。

sentence.Network_en: There may be alternative methods of substantiation other than written records.
sentence.Network_cn: 除书面记录外，可能还有其他方法可以证实。

英语语法术语.课堂教学用语_百度文库 ... 并列 coordination 选择 alternative 转折 transition.
从另类(Alternative)到英摇(brit-pop)， 读书会的同学尝试以Michel Foucault所提倡的系谱学作为研究另类摇滚与英式摇滚历史的主要方.
替代食物农业体系（AFNs）的“替代”(alternative)一词在英文中也有“非正统的，不寻常的”等含义，代表给人们提供一个不一样的、另 …

list.abs: 2012年职称英语词汇表最新完整版 - 豆丁网 ... altar n． 圣坛 alternate v． (使)交替，(使)轮流 although conj． 尽管，虽然.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... alpine 高山的 alternate 交替的；轮流的 alternative 两者挑一的；选择的.
民航专业常用词汇指南(ME)[1]_百度文库 ... alternate 交替,备用 alternately ad. 交替地 altitude 高度.
关于汽车专业的英语单词_百度知道 ... alternater bracket 发动机支架 alternator 交流发电机 alterntor assembly 交流发电机总成.
-tion后缀 ... hibernation 过冬, 冬眠, 避寒 alternation 交替, 交互, 轮流, 间隔 anticipation 预期, 预料.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'alternating, alternate'): from French alternatif, -ive or medieval Latin alternativus, from Latin alternare 'interchange' (see alternate)

entry.tran: 可供选择的；可供替代的
entry.def: If one thing is an alternative to another, the first can be found, used, or done instead of the second.

example.ex: New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers.
example.tran: 关节炎的新疗法可能是止痛药之外的另一种选择。

entry.def: An alternative plan or offer is different from the one that you already have, and can be done or used instead.

example.ex: There were alternative methods of travel available...
example.tran: 还有其他可选的旅行方式。

example.ex: They had a right to seek alternative employment.

entry.def: Alternative is used to describe something that is different from the usual things of its kind, or the usual ways of doing something, in modern Western society. For example, an alternative lifestyle does not follow conventional ways of living and working.

example.ex: ...unconventional parents who embraced the alternative lifestyle of the Sixties...
example.tran: 欣然接受60年代另类生活模式而不因循守旧的父母

example.ex: If you like alternative comedy you'll love this book.
example.tran: 如果你喜欢另类喜剧的话，你就会喜欢这本书。

entry.tran: （医疗）传统的，替代的（如提取植物成分制成药物、按摩和针灸）
entry.def: Alternative medicine uses traditional ways of curing people, such as medicines made from plants, massage, and acupuncture.
Alternative energy uses natural sources of energy such as the sun, wind, or water for power and fuel, rather than oil, coal, or nuclear power.

means.word_mean: 1. one of a number of things from which only one can be chosen;
2. necessitating a choice between mutually exclusive possibilities;

auth_sentence.content: We used to call it "alternative medicine".
auth_sentence.res_content: We used to call it "alternative medicine".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We used to call it "alternative medicine".

auth_sentence.content: BZP was supposed to be a safer legal alternative.
auth_sentence.res_content: BZP was supposed to be a safer legal alternative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BZP was supposed to be a safer legal alternative.

auth_sentence.content: But why this alternative look player just for CBBC?
auth_sentence.res_content: But why this alternative look player just for CBBC?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But why this alternative look player just for CBBC?

stems_affixes.type_exp: =other/to change, 表示"其他的,改变状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: altern其他的,改变状态+ate做,也可表示形容词→[二人]变着做事→交替[做事]
alternate[v.交替 adj.交替的]+ion动作或状态→n.交互,交错
alternate[v.交替 adj.交替的]+ive表名词和形容词→交替选择的方法
alternate[[v.交替 adj.交替的]]惶?or器→n.交流发电机
altern其他的,改变状态+ate做,也可表示形容词→[二人]变着做事→交替[做事]

Sentence.sentence: They prove to be a good alternative to petroleum.
Already there are many alternative fuel vehicles on the market, powered by anything from solar power to natural gas.
But as we all know, of all these alternative fuel vehicles, the most practical are electric vehicles

Confronted with such facts,some Swedish activists and legislators are demanding more extreme and far-reaching measures, such as replacing male and female pronouns with a neutral alternative and monitoring children more closely to correct them when they gravitate(被吸引) toward gendered play.
What are suggested as renewable and less-polluting energy alternatives?
Every time any official in Beijing deliberates publicly about seeking an alternative to the US dollar for the $

means.word_mean: 两者(或两者以上)择一的，二择其一的，可从数个中任择其一的；(两种选择中)非此即彼的

sentences.en: We returned by the alternative road.
sentences.cn: 我们从另一条路回来的。

means.word_mean: 不寻常的, 非传统性的

sentences.en: This kind of newspaper is alternative press.
sentences.cn: 这种报纸是非正统性报刊。

means.word_mean: 取舍, 抉择, 可供选择的事物

sentences.en: The only alternative to being taken prisoner was to die fighting.
sentences.cn: 除了当俘虏之外, 惟一的选择就是奋战至死了。

means.word_mean: 选择的余地, 可供选择的机会

sentences.en: I'm afraid I have no alternative but to report you to the police.
sentences.cn: 恐怕除了向警方告发你以外, 我是别无选择了。

jushi.english: This kind of newspaper is alternative press.
jushi.chinese: 这种报纸是非正统性报业。

jushi.english: We returned by the alternative road.
jushi.chinese: 我们从另一条路回来的。
